communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140/1 et seq.), I respectfully request the following records:

All email communications or written correspondence authored or sent by Assistant State’s Attorney Mr. Covington to Judge Zimmerman that reference or pertain to Case No. 25-CM-534. This includes any emails or communications sent between January 1, 2025, and the date this request is fulfilled.

Additionally, I request:

Any other emails, letters, or internal communications between the Madison County State’s Attorney’s Office and Judge D. Zimmerman that discuss or refer to Case No. 25-CM-534, regardless of author or recipient, during the same time period.

Please include attachments, metadata, and any CC’d or BCC’d parties, where applicable. If any responsive documents are withheld in part or in full, I request that you provide the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding, per 5 ILCS 140/9.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jeffrey Luffman
